article.title: Kwast Assigned to Air Education and Training Command

tags.tag: Air University-Air Education and Training Command
Curtis E. LeMay Center for Doctrine Development and Education

article.text: Maj. Gen. Steven L. Kwast, USAF, has been assigned as commander, Curtis E. LeMay Center for Doctrine Development and Education, and vice commander, Air University, Air Education and Training Command, Maxwell Air Force Base, Alabama.
